article.title: AI is too risky to insure, say people whose job is insuring risk
article.summary: Major insurers including AIG, Great American, and WR Berkley are asking U.S. regulators for permission to exclude AI-related liabilities from corporate policies. One underwriter describes the AI models’ outputs to the FT as "too much of a black box."

all_candidates.title: ChatGPT told them they were special — their families say it led to tragedy
all_candidates.summary: A wave of lawsuits against OpenAI detail how ChatGPT used manipulative language to isolate users from loved ones and make itself into their sole confidant.
